title: Partnership Information
description: COPYDRUM delivers the best content to more drummers through partnerships.

exclusiveLicense.title: Exclusive Sheet Music License
exclusiveLicense.description: We provide customized licenses for use in various environments such as performances, lessons, and sales.

premiumSupport.title: Premium Support
premiumSupport.description: We provide dedicated support for partners including new sheet music requests, custom transcriptions, and joint marketing.

sharedGrowth.title: Shared Growth
sharedGrowth.description: We expand the drummer community together through joint projects and events.

inquiry.title: Partnership Inquiry
inquiry.description: Are you ready to grow together through a partnership with COPYDRUM? Please contact us using the information below.
inquiry.note: Please provide detailed information in your inquiry for a quick response from our team.
